hadiths.text: Aishah said:When any of us was sexually defiled, she took three handfuls (of water) in this way, that is to say, with both hands together and poured (water) over her head. She took one handful (of water) and threw it on one side and the other on the other side

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَرْأَةِ هَلْ تَنْقُضُ شَعَرَهَا عِنْدَ الْغُسْلِ
chapter.eng-name: A Woman Undoing (The Braids Of) Her Hair While Performing Ghusl
